column8:
Marilyn Monroe had charisma and bags of it. For my Marilyn Monroe t-shirt design I have focused on her film career, which features such gems as 'Some Like It Hot' and 'The Seven Year Itch'. Marilyn's performances are mesmerising and unforgettable. 

 

Wear my Marilyn Monroe Posters t-shirt and admire a fine actress as well as beuaty.
column21: The eternally loveable and fascinating Marilyn Monroe is admired on this t-shirt from weadmire.net.

column5: Default Category/Natural History,Default Category/Science & Nature,Default Category/Sports,Default Category/Fishing,Default Category/Food
column8:
This t-shirt design admires the very pinnacle of game fishing, the Marlin.

Growing up to 20 feet in length and reaching almost 900kg, the Marlin is one formidable opponent.

The design features a Marlin performing its trademark jump out of the water and has a list of the current record holders of the five different Marlin species (Blue Atlantic, Blue Pacific, Black, striped and white).

Listing the people who caught them, the weight of the marlin, location caught and date for each one.
column21: This t-shirt design admires the very pinnacle of game fishing, the Marlin. From weadmire.net.

column5: Default Category/Design & Architecture,Default Category/Photography,Default Category/Popular Culture
column8:
This t-shirt design admires one of the last 35mm film SLR's, Nikon's F3MA.

During the mid 1990s, the popular but discontinued Nikon FE-2 had begun to skyrocket in value on the secondhand market. Nikon responded to this phenomenon with the FM3A.

The FM3A's expensive construction and conservative design were not intended to appeal to the consumer-level market. Nikon instead marketed the camera to serious amateur and professional photographers who were desirous of the highest possible quality and precision of control, and a service life estimated not in years, but decades.

Unfortunately, the introduction of the FM3A coincided with the "digital camera" revolution so many would be customers decided to try the much cheaper although less reliable digital camera's.

We admire the FM3A, because of it's extremely high quality components and its reliability in day-to-day use. It may have come onto the market at a difficult time for 35mm film camera's, but it is still a fantastic piece of design.

These shirts are printed on the front and back. The line drawing to the back of the shirt with the filled illustration on to the front. The filled illustration is printed at 800 dpi.

All shirts in this series are designed in Adobe Illustrator by Yukio Miyamoto  and are £40.

Other designs in this series are: Leica Camera  - V-Twin Motorcycle  - Fat Boy Motorcycle  - French Horn  -Lancer Evo Differential  - Nagra Audio Recorder  -
column21: This t-shirt design admires one of the last 35mm film SLR's, Nikon's F3MA. Illustrated by Yukio Miyamoto for weadmire.net.

column8: This T-Shirt is to celebrate Josef "Pepi" Bican’s (1913-2001) 417 offical league goals he managed to score when wearing the „stitched“ red and white shirt with a star (representing the heart every Slavia Prag player should be prepared to give for his team during the game). The idea is to stress that it would take an army of players these days to score that many goals for a single team. Nowadays, I can hardly imagine anybody scoring 57 goals in a single season as Pepi Bican did (1943-44). His statistics are overwhelming one could just go on and on...
column21: Nowadays, I can hardly imagine anybody scoring 57 goals in a single season as Pepi Bican did (1943-44). His statistics are overwhelming one could just go on and on... From weadmire.net.
